name: HIGHWAY 36/CITY OF BOULDER
sampleDescriptions: Monitor Department of Transportation Appropriations Bill. Support increased RAISE Grant funding at the Department of Transportation. Gain support for RAISE Grant application. Support Community Project
Track and monitor Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act implementation; Support revisions to FRA rules governing train horns. Support new definition for Bus Rapid Transit.
